isis.stitle: INTERNATIONAL® VT 365 DIESEL ENGINE - ENGINE ELECTRICAL - Main Engine Wiring Harness

warning.para: To prevent personal injury or death, disconnect the main negative battery terminal before removing or installing any electrical components.

note.para: The electrical harness does not need to be disconnected from the relay, unless the harness or relay is being replaced. Instead, the two relay mounting bolts or the three relay bracket bolts may be removed from the valve cover.

calloutgroup.callout1: To ECM (w/ fusible link) (X1 connector), glow plug harness busbars

step1.para: Disconnect electrical connections from glow plug relay terminals.
If not previously removed, remove ECM and IDM from mounting brackets .
Remove wiring harness clamps that secure wiring harness to cylinder heads and front cover.
Disconnect electrical connectors from fuel injectors and glow plug harness busbars.
Remove ground wire attached at the left side rear of intake manifold.
Carefully lift main harness away from engine.

caution.para: To prevent engine damage, do not tug on wiring harnesses while trying to remove them. If resistance is felt, find the source of resistance and free any connectors or clips that are caught before proceeding.
